member.name: IFsiFileItem.get_Data
member.summary: Retrieves the data stream of the file's content.
member.param: An IStream interface of the contents of the file.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

listheader.description:
Failed to allocate necessary memory.
Value: 0x8007000E

member.name: IFsiFileItem.get_DataSize
member.summary: Retrieves the number of bytes in the file.
member.param: Size, in bytes, of the file.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

member.name: IFsiFileItem.get_DataSize32BitHigh
member.summary: Retrieves the most significant 32 bits of the property.
member.param: Most significant 32 bits of the property.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

member.name: IFsiFileItem.get_DataSize32BitLow
member.summary: Retrieves the least significant 32 bits of the property.
member.param: Least significant 32 bits of the property.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

member.name: IFsiFileItem.put_Data
member.summary: Sets the data stream of the file's content.
member.param: An IStream interface of the content of the file to add to the file system image.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

listheader.description:
FileSystemImage object is in read only mode.
Value: 0xC0AAB102

summary.para: Use this interface to identify the file size and data stream of the file contents.
To get this interface, call the method.
